title: Install Idle Tracker
description: Installs the idle tracker program to track how long the computer has been idle so far.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass "& ./run.ps1',' -Account ', parameters('Account'), ' -PersonalAccessToken ', parameters('PersonalAccessToken'), ' -AgentName ''', parameters('AgentName'), ''' -AgentNamePrefix ''', parameters('AgentNamePrefix'), ''' -PoolName ''', parameters('PoolName'), ''' -AgentCount ''', parameters('AgentCount'), '''"')]
